# Mid and Upper Nithsdale (ward)

|elects_howmany=3
|councillor1=Tony Berretti
|party1=Scottish National Party
|councillor2=Jim H. Dempster
|party2=Independent (politician)
|councillor3=Andrew S. Wood
|party3=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|towns=Sanquhar
|scot_parl=Dumfriesshire
|scot_region=South Scotland
|westminster=Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale
|westminster2=Dumfries and Galloway
}}
Mid and Upper Nithsdale is one of the thirteen wards used to elect members of the Dumfries and Galloway Council. It elects three Councillors.
